website_summaries.verdict: This plant-based formulation cleans short hair well and even leaves longer hair silky. The scent doesn't last very long, though.
pros: Seals in natural sugars and proteins
Choice of lavender, chamomile, or coconut lime verbana
Free from PEG-80, alcohol and parabens
cons: A good temporary deodorizer, but it mostly masks dog smell rather than eliminating it

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: It's made with a nasty ingredient called sodium lauryl sulfate... read the below: So, the manufacturer of your dog’s shampoo likely isn’t purchasing coconut oil and synthesizing it to develop sodium lauryl sulfate. They’re purchasing the sodium lauryl sulfate and mixing it with other chemicals they purchased to develop their final formulation. Where they purchased that sodium lauryl sulfate and how it was synthesized may not be on their due diligence radar. If the manufacturer of your dog’s shampoo didn’t do their research and pay the additional money for sodium lauryl sulfate that was cleaned of contaminants, they may be introducing dangerous byproducts into your dog’s shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Get it! You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a godsend! I have a Samoyed mixed with Collie and washing him is a nightmare. When he smells I just spray the foam into my hands and work it into his coat then I brush him. It leaves him smelling so good!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try this. My dog has mild sleep incontinence and I use this to clean him off if needed (he usually wears a diaper). I'm a veterinary technician and really like what the waterless shampoos we use in the hospital but it is a little expensive so I decided to try something else. This works great, cleans well with not a lot of product. As with all waterless shampoos, it works best if you use it with a damp paper towel or wash cloth. I didn't give this 5 stars because it's not a spray (which is more convenient for me) and the smell is way too perfumey for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Burns eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. The smell is so strong that my goldendoodle hates it. I used it several time to clean around his mouth, and while is cleans it after 3 rubs, it smells very intensely. What is worse is that when I tried to kiss my dog, my eyes starting watering and burning - even after half an hour of rubbing this product in. I cannot imagine how much pain he is in if it burns my eyes this much!! I will never purchase this product again, if you care about your pup’s wellbeing, you shouldn’t either.
customer_reviews.author: noway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderul Product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It actually cleans like I gave my dog a bath with water & he smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Judy West

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This is no way can replace a wash if thats what you're hoping for. It covers the dog smell for a bit and then the dog stinks again when it drys. Also both my dogs got super itchy and red skin for weeks after I used the product. Hypoallergenic? Hardly. Nothing replaces a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick - Easy - Smells So Good!
customer_reviews.text: My 30 lb. Whippet/Lab mix hates water, and I have no tub or hand-held shower in my home. I'm a senior, so bending over to bathe my dog is an issue as well. I just used this wonderful smelling, waterless shampoo on her and think it's fantastic! It was quick, easy, foamy-goodness. Just a towel-rubdown and a quick brushing and her coat is super-soft....did I mention how good it smells? Plus, it's plant-based - no chemicals. And cheap! I am now washing my bedspread where the oily remains of her naps have been an issue. LOVE when a product really eliminates an ongoing issue!
customer_reviews.author: DianaQ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for in-between baths
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this a couple of times now. The product is a liquid foam like substance that functions as a dry shampoo. When my dog has been on the smelly side but not quite ready for a bath, i use it to cut down on odor and oil on his fur. We use it almost every day considering he sleeps in the bed with me. Highly recommend. It's a staple for us in our grooming routine.
customer_reviews.author: Keller Community Bicycle

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemicals in the product
customer_reviews.text: Hi I thought this was a natural organic product but its loaded with chemicals lauryl sulfate is very toxic for humans and animals and being it is a dry shampoo it stays on the animal. I would ask for a refund due to not knowing about the chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Best Waterless Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different waterless shampoos, but this one is the best. It smells fantastic, Very easy to use. It cleans the dogs coat well, you just rub it in and towel dry. This is the only waterless shampoo I will ever use!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McCann

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo for cats
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my cats every once and while when i notice they are scratching or licking a little too much. As soon as i apply this stuff it seems to instantly provide relief to them, and also leaves their fur feeling nice and soft, and smelling great for honestly a few weeks. The scent is clean fresh, like Oatmeal Pina colada. The foaming is very good, and you do not need a lot at all to coat them up well. Very much recommend, and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris94

customer_reviews.title: Works Well! Smells Divine & Smells Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: We can’t get to the groomer during these sad times and this product works very well as an alternative. Just make sure you brush your pooch VERY thoroughly first, apply product liberally working in sections. A dry washcloth is best to rub and wipe the product in. You may need to wet and rinse the washcloth several times wringing it well,...u don’t want it too wet. Later after it’s fully worked its magic, you’ll be rewarded with soft, silky dogs that smell oh so good.
customer_reviews.author: TLF

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product smelled delightful (that's the reason for two stars instead of one) but it otherwise did nothing. The smell faded very quickly and left the dog smelling worse than before. We were fostering a dog for an active duty service member and this poor hound smelled so bad. She got a bath every week which was drying her skin so we were hoping that this would let the baths be extended to give her some time to recover some oils on her coat. It left her coat looking oily and after just a few hours she was back to smelling like dog, only wet this time. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my beagle, who has all the traditional beagle smells, and I swear it actually made his odor worse. I bought this because he's terrified of water and baths, but I had to bathe him to get this stuff off. Not only did it stink, it made his hair oily and greasy. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: robin677

customer_reviews.title: Smells pretty, not too strong
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy for when you are going to take your dog out somewhere and you don't want him to smell like a dog. It's easy, dries fast, and leaves a very clean scent that you don't smell unless you hug/cuddle your dog, and then it just smells pleasant, and not as citrus-y as I was worried it might. As for actually cleaning your dog, I'm not so sure, as your basically just wetting him down a bit...definitely an excellent in-between-baths stink remover that does not seem to bother my dogs' skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in WNC

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great! I can do both my Saint Bernards with one bottle. Since they are large, opportunities for outside baths are few and far between in the northeast winters. The lime scent is nice and the shampoo really cleans. Odors are gone and not just covered up and the white parts of their coats are white again! I wasn’t crazy about the Lavender scent , but I love the lime.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering lavendar smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought the “calming” lavender. The smell was SO overwhelming, my dogs eyes were tearing as were mine. Maybe this was a bad batch, but WAY too much fragrance was put in this. Put them in the shower to try and get it off.. Horrible, smelled like a chemical cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Clean scent
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my outdoor cat. I was worried that he would not like the scent of this product. It doesn't bother him at all. I spray it on a face cloth and then wipe the cat down. It's nice to have a clean smelling cat without having to struggle while giving him a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sueb

customer_reviews.title: Gets th job done
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it comes as a foam dispenser and it makes applying this on my short haired dog very easy, and it don't really need to towel her off and it dries pretty quickly in our very warm weather. Although i normally love lavender, I find that the scent may be too heavy and initial application, and kind of wears off pretty fast in 2 days. But for the price it works great as ou go to in between baths.
customer_reviews.author: Monica C.

customer_reviews.title: Really effective, good smell, super soft coat.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves to roll in squirrel poop and it is awful. When I can’t do a full bath, I still want to do something to clean her up. Tried this and was amazed. Thought the scent might be too strong, but very mild once on and toweled her off. Completely removed the awful scent. Left her coat silky and super soft. She actually loved having it massaged in, even on her face (kept away from eyes), which indicates the scent wasn’t too strong... other products she clearly found to be too strong smelling.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for an arthritic dog who has trouble standing in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is arthritic and standing on the slippery shower floor kinda wears him out. So I bought this as an alternative to washing him with water. My plan is not to use it all the time, but just to lessen the number of water washings in the shower he gets. After my first try I'm pleasantly surprised by this. His coat is soft and clean and is staying that way. I will say that this won't clean dirty paws. For that I use hypo-allergenic baby wipes which do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Frank VTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Smell - A+
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed with this purchase. I've used it on both my dogs and cats and the smell is AMAZING. It's also left their coats so soft and shiny. I use it on the dogs in-between grooming sessions and on the cats when I want to freshen up their coats a bit. It's so easy to apply and air drys nicely. The smell is what got me to write a review. I'm a huge cuddler with my cats and I was so pleased with how good they smelled after this!! Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: dameow687

customer_reviews.title: Best foaming shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foam shampoo for dogs available. The scent is lovely and it leaves the dogs smelling fresh for days. I add it to the pet shampoo and massager brushes that I bought here on Amazon. With these brushes it helps to get the shampoo right down to the skin. The foam allows me to get a handful of it and massage it on the under areas that cannot really be accessed with a spray on shampoo. It is sold here on Amazon for much less than in stores or on Chewy.com.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic alternative to baths for dogs that hate water
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have a gsd that hates water. She gets dry skin, and a bit smelly sometimes, and needs something to clean her up. This foam works great. I usually put it on my hand the rub it into her fur and skin. After that, I take paper towels actually and wipe her down/fluffy her up because it takes some of the moisture and it pulls the dirt out. Then I'll brush her to help it get more to the skin. I'm not a huge coconut fan but this stuff smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: KatB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but strong smell...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because it does what it says. I bought his for my Airedale puppy who would wet her kennel sometimes overnight. I didn't want to bath her each time because I was afraid of irritating her skin. This stuff did seem to take the pee out and leave her fur soft and looking clean, however it smelled SO strong of fake perfume I couldn't handle it. I just hosed her off and let her smell like dog because that was more bearable for me. Luckily the overnight peeing was short lived. If you don't mind strong fake scents, you will probably be pleased with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Bad Scent and Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the smell. Hard to apply. Messy and left the dogs hair tacky/sticky. Not happy at all with the Product.
customer_reviews.author: K. patton

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and it smells good
customer_reviews.text: I live in the country and my little rescue pup loves to play outside. I hate giving baths too often, it's such a mess and she runs around the house like a little demon afterwards. If I let her outside, she's rolling in the grass to dry off which defeats the purpose of the bath. I really like the ease of use of this product and she smells good afterwards. I've not noticed any issues affecting her skin and she willingly stands while I massage it in and towel her off. A very handy product to have on hand and use in between regular baths.
customer_reviews.author: YellowRoseTXTop Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather give my dog a bath
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this product. It makes my full-coated yorkies hair greasy... it's best just to give your dog a bath if you want a clean dog. The scent was pleasant though and product ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: WildflowerSpice

customer_reviews.title: Raise your paw if you love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old black lab gets plenty of baths in the spring/summer but in between or in the cold months we rely a lot on this product. It smells amazing (we use the oatmeal one) and our doggo loves it. He tries to eat it when we foam it into our hands to pet through his fur, so we have to move quickly, but he loves the “game” and he smells great afterward. Bought it first in stores then through amazon and price difference was just a few cents but Amazon’s price was better.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. King

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Hank loved it, he's a pit with very sensitive skin and he just always had this smell even though he was clean! I put this on him after a bath and he smelt like he was going out on a hot date, he smelled so good! It lasted about 2 days but this is a price I will gladly pay and I only used 2 pumps! If it last me a month I'll be happy but at this rate I think it will! Definitely a great buy and I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large dogs(German Shepherd & a Siberian Husky) and a tub that is not easy to bathe them in. I'm so glad I found this. It helps me in the colder months when I can't take them out side or when we travel. I can tell it really works. They always look and feel like they have had a bath after I use it. I also have an indoor cat that this helps with. I highly recommend for those in between the bath moments. Life saver for me!
customer_reviews.author: J-Duhh

customer_reviews.title: Great for in between showers.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dog because she had a couple fleas bite her. She was itchy after that. This helped so much. She didn’t itch afterwards. I like that I don’t have to take her a shower every time I take her out and she gets a little dirty. So many things i like about it. It smells really good too. The only reason I knocked down a star is because her fur doesn’t look as nice as when I shower her. I’m in love with this product as a filler for in between showers.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So happy I decided to buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pekingese who has a ton of hair, I used it today since it's going to be time for a bath soon and oh my god it smells amazing. I am very pleased and excited that I ran into this product. Her coat feels soft and smells amazing. I got the coconut lime scent.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell Only lasts for 3 seconds
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy something that will last for more than 3 seconds. I hope at least there’s some type of cleansing effect. The smell goes away after a few seconds and your dog is back to smelling bad
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Moore

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Smell is great and works great on my two large dogs (68 pounds and 75 pounds). They get extra smelly from dog wraslin’ in the backyard and this is a great refresher between baths. It takes a lot of foam for them because of how large they are but is super easy to use. I just rub it into their fur and let it dry. I don’t brush it through their fur or wipe them down with a towel because they aren’t dirty, just stinky.
customer_reviews.author: MRJ

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I love the option of getting my dog fresh without a full on bath. I have a german shepherd puppy (7 months now) and so she takes forever to try, is too big and hairy to bathe inside, outside baths are only possible when the weather is right. I used this on her and she smelled so good, for a few days. I wish it would have lasted longer, but I noticed that when she would go out in the rain the scent would come back. Much better than wet dog smell. Didn't seem to leave her itchy or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The smell is okay, I would say a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell is okay, I would say a little overwhelming but it calms down after a while. The main functionality of it which is cleaning, I just don't see how it accomplishes anything. I have been able to remove more dirt with just water and dog wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with ringworm this winter. I had to give 2 of my 6 cats sulfur baths 2 times a week for 3 weeks. The smell of sulfur stayed with them for a month. This helped alot with the odor. It could have been a little strong scent. I used quite a bit and it made their fur a little wet looking after it dried. Just use a little would work better. I just needed more because of them smelling like sulfur.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what the reviews stated
customer_reviews.text: I have three long haired dogs at my house. I was excited because of all the 5 star reviews well, I tried this product and I was very disappointed by how it left the dogs fur not soft at all. Maybe this would work better for short haired dogs? Also, the smells is not my favorite either. Maybe someone will enjoy this but, I will not be buying this product again. Now I am on the hunt for a good waterless shampoo now.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness101

customer_reviews.title: Works good, didn't last too long
customer_reviews.text: I have a short hair boxer and a long haired Newfoundland mix so I was surprised this waterless shampoo actually worked for both dogs. It took one bottle to do both dogs and I was pleasantly surprised at how well each dog cleaned up and smelled after following the instructions. The pleasant smell lasted a day or two and then I needed to use after-bath spray to keep the dog smell away. So all in all this product works but the clean didn't last as long as a "real" bath, however for how easy the process was (compared to a real, full bath), I rate it four stars. If this review was helpful, please click the button below :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I won't throw out the product but nor will I buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say about this product. I feel like it leaves a "film" in my golden retrievers coat, but I'm not sure perhaps if I'm doing it correctly. Or perhaps I'm a fan of just simply wiping my dog down with unscented wipes because I can physically see the dirt on the wipes whereas with this product I don't see where the dirt goes even if I wipe him down with a towel afterwards. So I'm meh. I won't throw out the product but nor will I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H

customer_reviews.title: Little too fragrant for my likeness
customer_reviews.text: The product works as described and sub 3 dollars, it is really not bad to use between grooming. The only thing is that I find the scent too strong and artificial, I feel a little bad for my dog when we choose to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nam

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to sound gross but hear me out. I have 2 white Bichons, a female & male, that for some unknown reason to me pee on each other. This stuff works amazing for that. Takes it right out. I go over my house with a UV flashlight to make sure I don't miss cleaning up any pet messes and I also check my dogs with it. Happy to say my dogs don't glow after using this. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Brenda from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: We've got a small mixed breed that has terrible BO. I’ve been using human dry shampoo on him, but he doesn’t like the sound of the aerosol. So I looked for similar dog solutions and found this. The plus side is that the mousse doesn’t spook my dog like the aerosol, but it doesn’t effectively clean the BO out and the smell of the shampoo isn’t very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, nice light scent
customer_reviews.text: My Rottweiler was getting some serious stink ear (not from an infection or anything) and I did not want to bathe her in the winter weather. I sprayed this all over her especially the head, worked it in and then toweled her off. This was weeks ago and I have had to do one little touchup since. Its a very nice scent, no strong at all. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Weakly Reader

customer_reviews.title: Smell is too strong
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of being able to freshen up my large dog with a dry shampoo, however the scent is just too strong. It did clean her up, but I just can't get past that overpowering smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn’t like it. Greasy build up
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it makes my dogs coat so greasy... we combed him through after and it was waxy. We tried a different scent thinking that’s what it was and the second scent was so much more greasy buildup. It wouldn’t even come off the comb
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on how a no rinse product would work since we already use dog wipes for her feet after walks....but I’m amazed at how awesome this is! So easy to use and my dog smells great...plus I feel like it gets her fur clean between baths. You need to try this. I love the way the coconut lime smells....
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Less stinky pups!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pups and I try not to bathe them too much to avoid drying out their skin and coat. Of course, their favorite thing to do is get dirty and smelly. I got this to avoid traumatizing them (and myself) with more baths than necessary. It's a simple product to use and my girls love it because they get extra rubs. It makes them smell great and it doesn't leave a gross residue on their coats.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quick acting and my Luna Belle smells sweet and has a sleek, glossy shine!!
customer_reviews.text: My lab mix gets that hound smell after being outdoors and this works wonderfully to eliminate that odor. This product is simple to use, quick acting, leaves her super glossy and sweet smelling. Gr8 in between baths and as needed. This scent is not overly “perfumes” just clean smelling & eliminates that stinky dog smell.
customer_reviews.author: Leesy

customer_reviews.title: When a wet bath for your dog is not possible, an excellant option
customer_reviews.text: We had an aging dog who has since passed. However this helped keep him clean as he was bed bound in his last weeks and could no longer get up and walk. Simply apply and massage in and rub off with a damp wet cloth or towel. Plus it's $1.50 less than at Target, which ran out of stock and never seemed to get back in stock. I was very glad to find it here, and at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A. Schuman

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love to be washed this way instead of a bath or shower. Our dogs spend a lot of time outside and playing or laying in the dirt so need to be washed more often, this waterless shampoo does the trick for in between the tub time. I had to deduct a start because we just don't care for the oatmeal/coconut smell it.
customer_reviews.author: PandaV

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing. I got it a week ago and used it right away on my dog because it smelled so good. It’s been a week and she still smells good. I just got her fixed so she wasn’t aloud to get her incision wet so that is the reason I bought this. I think I’ll continue to buy it though bc her coat is soft and shiny also. Definitely would recommend on so many levels!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and leaves soft coats!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great. I did a patch test on my dogs before using it all over them because some dogs may have sensitive skin. They were both perfectly fine. As for the longevity of the sent, it lasts about a day and a half. I would recommend brushing your dog(s) after applying to get their coat soft. You would do that with most waterless shampoos, so overall I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Devi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact this is a foam, makes it easy to use. I don't recommend it because I feel like it leaves a residue behind instead of a clean feeling, even after brushing. Right now i just use it to clean my dog's feet when they come back inside after a walk honestly. I just don't like the way it feels. I will NOT purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony22

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a residue
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my veterinarian had some waterless shampoo in a spray bottle and I like the convenience of not giving my dog a bath everyday that he gets tinkle on his leg hairs (he has very long hair). Unfortunately, this brand leaves a residue that makes his hair sticky. It also needs to be dried off with a damp rag in order to get the dirt off. I'll need to keep searching for a better product. The two stars is for the nice smell and because the foam is nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel

customer_reviews.title: The Man and I love the smell of this waterless shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The Man and I love the smell of this waterless shampoo. I don't know if the dog likes it but he likes when Daddy rubs him down so at the least he's not bothered by it. It doesn't seem to leave any weird residue so I'm very happy about that. We use it as a refresher between his twice monthly baths. We only use a small amount and it seems this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: PatriciaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Danger
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it on my dog because it has a VERY DANGEROUS chemical that causes CANCER. In fact, before I ordered it I was trying to find out the ingredients and it’s not mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Glucklick

customer_reviews.title: Spa Day
customer_reviews.text: My pups hate getting sprayed with doggy perfume so I bought this to help between baths because we take them to a groomer. Let me just say, this is amazing! I put some on my rubber hand grooming gloves to really get into the fur and my pups love the rubs instead of worrying about what I’m putting on them! Plus the scent is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No mess, great scent, happy pup!
customer_reviews.text: I really expected this to be messy. My dog is wire haired and baths require a lot of deep massage to get past her waterproof fur. I thought I would have to use a lot of this waterless shampoo and her fur would be everywhere. But I used less than half what I was expecting to go through. My dog loves the massage much more than she does a bath, and it smells so good. Because of her wirey fur, I did also use a soft bristle brush to work the shampoo in. It smells great, and was so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 114 lb German Shepherd, he doesn’t mind scent, no skin problems and he doesn’t lick 👍 and I love it. Only problem is I signed up 3 mos. shipments and they Had scheduled for shipment in 1 month, I had to cancel I’m going to have to re-order I don’t know what went wrong there. The product is very good ,,,recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charliegirl

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR GIANT DOGS
customer_reviews.text: I just used this to "bathe" our St. Bernard (who is huge and not a fan of "baths"). It was easy, smelled great, and dried quickly. He really appreciated that I applied it with my hands and massaged it into his fur instead of being sprayed.....he runs circles in the yard when he thinks he's going to be sprayed! Thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: I Love the Scent - My Dog Doesn't
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this product 5 stars but I can't because the one who it's for would probably give it 1 if she could. Personally I think it smells amazing and when I have managed to get it on my pup she smells great for a long time. It dries well and it's not sticky. However, my dog is not a big fan of the smell. I've used "unscented" products that are similar with no issues but when she smells this she flips out and tries to hide. I keep hoping she'll get used to it because it is a great product but so far no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use and smelled nice and I really wanted to like it but my dog was still greasy after using this. I feel like it should've done something to her fur but she seemed worse after using it so I had to give her an actual bath (which she loved anyways). I would give it a try as the cost isn't too high to see if it works for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: seeking_peace

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering scent and film-y
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on our friend's corgi. The scent, though pleasant, was a little overpowering, and it left her coat with a film. I will not use this again.
customer_reviews.author: A&P

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell and the ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I use this on both our cats and dog in between grooming visits at the vet. Love the smell and the ease of use. We have a Belgian Shepherd who has a high energy level and bathing him is harder than bathing our two cats. It takes me less than 5 minutes to get our pup clean and fresh smelling again. His coat is so smooth and moisturized. The cats don't hate this and don't mind getting foamed cleaned. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SR0412

customer_reviews.title: Wow! AWESOME Product :-)
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded ALL of my expectations! My dogs are usually really picky/overly cautious about new smells, or anything bath-related, but they loved this! I even used it on my fabric couch/pillows to freshen up any bit of a “dog smell,” & it worked perfectly. The foam texture makes it really easy to apply, & the scent is INCREDIBLE! Wish I could give this a 10 star rating!
customer_reviews.author: ✨🤟🏽✨

customer_reviews.title: Groomer Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this waterless shampoo! As a retired groomer, I know what works and what doesn't, and this works wonderfully! The pump is great for those dogs like mine (coonhound) that hate the sound of a squirt bottle. It only takes about 6 pumps to freshen up a large short haired dog and the scent is awesome, also keeps the "hound" smell away for about a week! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shra

customer_reviews.title: Great waterless shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this waterless shampoo! My dog (like most dogs) hates getting in the bathtub and getting cleaned up so this waterless shampoo makes it great as we can keep times between getting into the actual tub stretch out further. It is not overly strong scented and doesn't take as long for him m to dry off after wards so water isn't everywhere from where he lays on things.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: It worked on my hairy dog. Summer months.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on my big hairy golden golden doodle. It worked very well. It made his hair shiny, no residue, took away stinky dog smell. The product's scent is strong for a day but fades and the stinky dog smell doesn't come back. I do recommend gloves if sensitive to strong smells because the smell stayed on my hands for the whole day. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TwiiGo Finds

customer_reviews.title: Works for the smell, leaves a film
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my goldendoodle. It definitely gets rid of the dog smell. My complaint is that it leaves a powdery film. I took a slicker brush to her, it made her look great, but my hands were covered in the powdery stuff. Maybe I used too much. I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: AmyK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog hate taking baths, so this helps a tremendous amount to keep him clean to where I dont I have to bathe him as often. Smells awesome the smell lasts about a day and him staying clean lasts about 3 days. And it only takes about 3 to 4 pumps to get him fully covered making the bottle last long.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne baber

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I was a little skeptical at first but thought I’d give it a try since I haven’t been able to take my pup to the dog groomers. I have an Irish wolfhound and he has rough, course far. He knots up if he’s not bathed and brushed. This product did wonders on him. It was easy to use and made his fur soft once it dried. Initially when I used it on him he smelled like a Febreze coverup. Once my pup dried, he smelled so good and his coat felt so soft. I would highly recommend this product. I’ll continue to use this product in between baths. Buy it! You won’t be sorry:)
customer_reviews.author: Ed Roth

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny + the same day prime shipping I paid, lol! Stinky puppy no more!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! We brought home a new 7-month old poodle puppy a week ago that was seriously smelly after living in an outdoor kennel at a breeders all his life...even after we gave him a bath and took him to the groomer. I used very little and just rubbed it into his fur all over and he smells delicious now! I never write reviews - but this stuff is fantastic! I can finally love on my new puppy instead of cringing from his smell!!! If you are dealing with a smelly dog or just need to stretch out the time between bathing sessions - try this. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: CFLyons

customer_reviews.title: Great option in btw baths!
customer_reviews.text: It does mask funky odor on your pets fur in btw baths and has a really nice fragrance. To be honest work just like any spray fragrance for dogs except this is a foam instead of a spray. My dogs had no allergies with it, no loss of fur and on my little mutt actually gave him a little bit of gloss to his fur he seems to like it more than my husky, he has a thicker coat and rarely get smelly, on him it made no difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricia Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Can I get a human body wash in this scent?
customer_reviews.text: I have a chow, so washing her regularly is out of the question. But gosh, does she stink sometimes. I like that this neutralizes her odors (doesn't seem to be just a cover up), and it smells fantastic. I kind of wish my own bath products smelled this good.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant, clean smell, EXCELLENT VALUE & cleans thoroughly! 10 *s
customer_reviews.text: These are EXCELLENT overall! Im suprised by just how clean it got my babies being waterless but they we clean and SO soft! The scent is good too, not overwhelming but definitely there, unless you don't like the smell of lime or verbena. If you do then you'll LOVE this scent, it smells EXACTLY like Bath & Body Works' coconut, lime & verbena. Also an EXCELLENT VALUE! I just wish they made it in a whitening shampoo..
customer_reviews.author: Amy M. Alford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a short hair Jackchiweenierat. She stinks! This waterless shampoo does miracles on her stink! She loves it and thinks it's a great game to see the foam and have me rub it in. She never complains and sleeps in my bed. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: milo101

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried another waterless shampoo (I think it was the tropiclean one) and this one is so much better. I bought the coconut lime scent and it smells amazing. My dogs like to play a lot and start to stink really fast so this stuff is nice to have. Also didn’t notice it changing the way their fur felt or making it look bad. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Carina P.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: My one dog is lucky to have a quarter of an inch of hair. It's like felt length. As you know, they need they'd oils. I use this in between baths for this reason. Easy to apply. Dispense some, massage in, then wipe with a towel. Cleans him up.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good between washes
customer_reviews.text: So like most dogs, mine hate baths. This foam has helped a lot between bath days. It smells nice and easy to apply. It doesn't make my dogs' coats look greasy or sticky. They smell freshly bathed without the wet dog smell. It also works on the cat
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Rose Chapa

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Don't understand the quadrupled price in 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dry shampoo. It's not sticky and love that is the same scent as the shampoo I bought. It lasts a few days on my 108 lbs bernedoodle and helps with his stinkyness. I bought it for $5.99 and when I wanted to order again (a couple of months later) it was $20!!! I haven't been able to find it again for less than that. I would buy it again but not for that price!
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Tudorache

customer_reviews.title: this smells awesome, but isn't as potent as i would've hoped
customer_reviews.text: this smells awesome, but isn't as potent as i would've hoped. i'd say for the first day, my puppy smells amazing and by the second day, the scent has faded tremendously. by the third day, i can't really smell it at all anymore. still, i'll probably repurchase this because it doesn't irritate his skin and it does smell pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my dog between washes
customer_reviews.text: This waterless shampoo is a life saver! We took the dog on a 20 hour car trip and sprayed her before and during the trip - kept her smelling fresh and kept us from smelling dog the whole way! It smells wonderful and is very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will hate you not matter what
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stress free alternative for my 8 year old tabby cat and his roommate who have managed to avoid bath time for over a year. Your cat will hate you no matter what but it was WAY easier than dragging his ass into the shower and both of us being stressed over it. He still was scared of the squirt noise from the bottle so I would suggest taking them into the bathroom so it's as quick and painless as possible. He was a good boy and got a teat. The cat smells like oatmeal now tho, I docked it a star for the purfume-y sent but other wise I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: alexis loya

customer_reviews.title: Works for short time
customer_reviews.text: This product sent is not very good it’s not per say bad but it’s not the best either. It does not last a long time maybe two days most. Other than that it is easy to use and as long as you keep on ordering it you couldn’t keep on using it between baths to keep your dog clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I have a half bald Goldendoodle and she smells sometimes because she has no hair on her tummy and back (freaky genes??), so this shampoo removes excess oils and gives her a nice fresh smell. Her skin is also soft and not dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell, and fresh fur!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing and my dog felt nice and clean for about a week (which is normal for him because he has a skin condition). This product allows me to bathe him less, so his skin doesn't dry out. He is a German Shep/ Husky mix so there is a LOT of fur. I used half the bottle for one use. But for the price, that's not bad. I would order again
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hines

customer_reviews.title: Clean smelling pup in between baths
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to freshen up my dog in between baths. It is a foam product that gets his fur a little wet, but it dries quickly so it does not bother me. This product smells really good, clean, but not overpowering. I also have the lavender one, and I like them both the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates baths, this is far less stressful but, I’m sure she’ll still need a bath every now and then. Very easy to use for a small dog. Not sure how well it would work for a large dog. You’d probably use up a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fixes smelly dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so our dogs got fixed recently and we couldnt give them a bath for 2 weeks. And they were stinking!!!! But this worked amazingly! They smelled so good after applying this. It worked great, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BKWO

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. It’s reasonably priced and very good quality. My dog is always smelling fresh cuz I use this dry shampoo interchangeably with the matching wipes. I’ve tried all the scents, and they’re all great.
customer_reviews.author: Ragdollyanna

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I have an older dog that doesn't do so well with baths anymore so I was looking for something to try so I wouldn't have to bath her as often but still get the dirt and dander off. This worked so well I ended up using it on all 3 of my dogs and only used half a bottle! I was so amazed. They feel so soft and all smell so nice. One of my dogs that needs a regular bath because of his skin (who will start scratching when it's close to bath time) stopped scratching. I highly recommend giving this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in between bath time
customer_reviews.text: I love using this in between bath time. Maybe every other day or so.. just depends on how dirty my dogs get during their walks. The scent is a little strong and I'm not too fond of it. It's not unpleasant or anything, but just not my type. Other wise, it's great
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jo Custodio

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, nice long lasting scent!
customer_reviews.text: This product is super easy to use, the scent lasts without being overpowering. The cost is unbeatable as well!
customer_reviews.author: MDavie

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: This waterless shampoo it’s great, it helps keep my dogs smelling great for about a week. This product is not intended to replace baths but to keep your fury friend smelling great for a few days during winter, which is what I use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Way too strong of a scent
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well and easy to apply. I just think the fragrance is way too strong. It smells like a strong perfume. I have tried both scents (lime and lavender) and thye jjth are too strong for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Desai

customer_reviews.title: Smells great; gentle foam
customer_reviews.text: I put it on my stinky Pittie as soon as it came in. She hates anything sprayed or rubbed on her but she survived the heavenly foam massage. The coconut/lime scent is amazing. This will work just fine in between actual baths.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLareau

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! Can’t review actual product. !
customer_reviews.text: I never received this shampoo reordered another one and never received that one either. I am so disappointed that I didn’t get to try this shampoo on my dog!!
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my two dogs in between baths and this is phenomenal! Doesn't make their skin itch or dandruff. Scent is lovely. I also recommend the lavender camomile.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymiss31

product_meta.title: Wahl Pet Friendly Waterless No Rinse Shampoo for Animals – Oatmeal & Coconut Lime Verbena for Cleaning, Conditioning, Detangling & Moisturizing Dogs, Cats & Horses – 7.1 Oz
product_meta.description: The Wahl waterless, no rinse oatmeal & coconut lime verbena shampoo is great for shampooing between baths. Formulated with all-natural plant-based cleansers. The oatmeal fragrance is designed to give your pet a fresh and clean smell without having to give them a full path. Our plant derived formula makes our waterless shampoos the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dogs and themselves. Our shampoos are PEG-80 free, alcohol free, paraben free, and pH balanced. Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member. Our dog icon, Rocket, was designed in the image of our family dog Cooper – a golden doodle, who has severe allergies. This is the only shampoo we have found safe and effective. He loves the smell too!
feature_bullets: Made in the USA - Our oatmeal & coconut lime verbena waterless shampoo is pH balanced, alcohol free, paraben free, PEG-80 free and is highly recommended for gentle cleaning and freshening dogs, cats, & other animal coats
No Rinsing Necessary – For dogs, cats, horses, or other animals that don’t like wet shampoos; no rinsing necessary, simply dry with a towel & brush coat

Oatmeal Formula – This plant derived oatmeal & coconut lime verbena scented waterless shampoo is great for cleansing, conditioning, detangling, & moisturizing animals; our oatmeal formula moisturizes dry itchy skin.

Allergy Friendly - Our dog icon, Rocket, was designed in the image of our family dog Cooper – a golden doodle, who has severe allergies. This is the only shampoo we have found safe and effective. He loves the smell too!

The Brand Used by Professionals - Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member
